long_description: The SMC Rigging/Descending ring is the strongest aluminum ring of its size and can be used in a number of ways while climbing. Rigging/Descending ring can be used as part of your anchor system or haul system, or as a connection point between 'biners. Inside diameter will accommodate 3 standard-size carabiners. SMC Rigging/Descending ring weighs only 26g and is rated at 32kN.
short_description: The SMC Rigging/Descending ring is the strongest aluminum ring of its size and can be used in a number of ways while climbing.
